name: SuperStar WOOLLIM
description:
Exciting new music game with your favorite artists from WOOLLIM Entertainment!
Make your favorite artist the best K-POP Star with SUPERSTAR WOOLLIM!

▶SUPERSTAR WOOLLIM◀
- 8 artists/Groups from WOOLLIM Entertainment
- 40+ songs in variation.
- 190+ cards to collect
- Compete other users in 9 different leagues

▶Main Features◀
- CardBook system added. Check your own cards.
- 3 different levels of difficulty for each song.(EASY/NORMAL/HARD)
- Star cards that can be collected/enhanced to get more bonus points.
- Weekly highest scores to determine your league rank
- 9 different leagues determined by your weekly league ranking.


▶Featured Artists◀
INFINITE
Lovelyz
Golden Child
Rocket Punch
Kim Sung Kyu
NAM WOO HYUN
JANG DONG WOO
Kei
-----------------
[Access Permission Rights For Smart Device App]

SUPERSTAR WOOLLIM hereby asks you to grant permission to access specific apps in smart devices to provide the Service as set forth in these Terms of Service.

*Required Access Rights*
Picture (Photos / Gallery) / Video / File : To save a game data
Read, Record and Save at External Storage : To save sound source data cache and game options
Device ID and Call Information : Advertising Tracking Research and Token Generation For The Push Notification
Wi-Fi Connection Information : To send a message about Wi-Fi connection when there is an additional data download
ID : Required for 'User Account Generation and Check'

[Access Permission Revoke]
Settings > SUPERSTAR WOOLLIM > Access Agree or Access Revoke

※ Visual Setting
If you experience lags in the game you can change your visual setting to low resolution for better performance.

※ If you have any inquiries or require any further information, please contact us at.
E-MAIL: support.superstar.woollim@dalcomsoft.com
